      • validateByApplicationScopeValidator

        public static boolean validateByApplicationScopeValidator(OAuthTokenReqMessageContext tokenReqMsgContext,
                                                          OAuthAuthzReqMessageContext authzReqMessageContext)
                                                   throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        Validate the scopes in the request using application scope validators.
        Parameters:
        tokenReqMsgContext - If a token request, can pass an OAuthTokenReqMessageContext object.
        authzReqMessageContext - If an authorization request, can pass an OAuthAuthzReqMessageContext object.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the validation successful, FALSE otherwise.
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception
